dmca.title: [ABUSE] Assistance
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Richard Bremer [mailto:rich.bremer@chevesmedia.com] 
Sent: Friday, August 12, 2005 9:06 AM
To: The Planet Policy Enforcement; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: RE: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Assistance]

Dear The Planet -

This guy is still at it - he's ripped off another 2 off our copyrighted
editorial pieces. Please let me know the status of our inquiry.

Thanks

Rich

Richard Bremer
Director of Advertising and Media Relations Cheves Media, LLC
Office: (734) 222 9616
Mobile: (734) 277 4201
rich.bremer@chevesmedia.com

www.GISuser.com
www.LBSzone.com
www.MAPuser.com
The American Surveyor Magazine www.TheAmericanSurveyor.com


-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]
Sent: Thursday, August 11, 2005 12:18 PM
To: rich.bremer@chevesmedia.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Assistance]


*** PGP SIGNATURE VERIFICATION ***
*** Status:   Good Signature from Invalid Key
*** Alert:    Please verify signer's key before trusting signature.
*** Signer:   Abuse <abuse@theplanet.com> (0x9B3AA325)
*** Signed:   8/11/2005 12:17:48 PM
*** Verified: 8/12/2005 10:00:38 AM
*** BEGIN PGP VERIFIED MESSAGE ***

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Assistance
Date: Thu, 11 Aug 2005 11:37:47 -0400
From: Richard Bremer <rich.bremer@chevesmedia.com>
Reply-To: rich.bremer@chevesmedia.com
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>,        <admins@theplanet.com>

Dear Peter -

I am writing to see if you can rectify a situation for us. One of your
hosted IPs (70.84.128.116 - www.geoamaan.com) is ripping off our copyrighted
material that we are publishing and running it on his site as his own. Can
you contact Mr. Shahida Bano and please request that he cease his actions.
He is free to publish the opening paragraph and then link to the content on
our site, but copying it verbatim on his site is unacceptable.

Thanks for your assistance on this matter.

Rich

Richard Bremer
Director of Advertising and Media Relations Cheves Media, LLC
Office: (734) 222 9616
Mobile: (734) 277 4201
rich.bremer@chevesmedia.com

www.GISuser.com
www.LBSzone.com
www.MAPuser.com
The American Surveyor Magazine www.TheAmericanSurveyor.com




--
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

*** END PGP VERIFIED MESSAGE ***
